MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.14pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:45pm on Saturday, 17 April 2021
